duties_responsibilities.duty: Read and comprehend all contract documents including specifications, project scopes, drawings, and standards to prepare accurate project cost estimates.
Assemble scoped RFPs for vendors and subcontractors to obtain pricing, analyze, compare, and select the best-value vendor and subcontractor proposals for inclusion in cost estimates.
Prepare schedules for proposal submission and attend pre-bid meetings and site walk-downs to understand project scope, conditions, physical restrictions, etc.
Escort subcontractors on-site visits, walking them through the scope of work to obtain the most accurate pricing and attend in-house project turnover meetings from estimating to project management.
Understand and appropriately estimate the costs associated with safety and other project location-specific work rules and utilize historical cost data to develop cost estimates.

Maintain quality service by following organization standards and maintain continuity among corporate, division, and local work teams by documenting and communicating actions, irregularities, and continuing needs.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Construction Management, Engineering, or a related field
